SEARCH
Package gw.api.graph.compare

Interface QueryableBeanComparison

All Superinterfaces:
GraphComparison<KeyableBean>
All Known Subinterfaces:
PolicyComparison
public interface QueryableBeanComparison extends GraphComparison<KeyableBean>
Represents a graph comparison of entities that has methods to query state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T extends KeyableBean>
    EntityMatch<T>
    findMatch(T bean)
    Finds the EntityMatch corresponding to the given bean, or null if bean has no corresponding match.
    Collection<EntityMatch<KeyableBean>>
    getMatches()
    Returns a collection of matches between the compared entity graphs.
    boolean
    hasDifferences()
    Returns true if the compared entity graph nodes have differences.
    boolean
    hasMatch(KeyableBean bean)
    Returns true if there is an EntityMatch for the given bean.

    Methods inherited from interface gw.api.graph.compare.GraphComparison

    getAdded, getRemoved

  • Method Details

    • getMatches

      Collection<EntityMatch<KeyableBean>> getMatches()
      Returns a collection of matches between the compared entity graphs.
      Specified by:
      getMatches in interface GraphComparison<KeyableBean>
      Returns:
      All bean matches

    • findMatch

      <T extends KeyableBean> EntityMatch<T> findMatch(T bean)
      Finds the EntityMatch corresponding to the given bean, or null if bean has no corresponding match.
      Parameters:
      bean - The bean to find a match for
      Returns:
      The match that the bean participates in, or null if none

    • hasMatch

      boolean hasMatch(KeyableBean bean)
      Returns true if there is an EntityMatch for the given bean.
      Parameters:
      bean - The bean (key)
      Returns:
      True if the bean has a match

    • hasDifferences

      boolean hasDifferences()
      Returns true if the compared entity graph nodes have differences.
      Returns:
      True if entity graphs have differences
